name: A Surreal Climb
description:
A surreal version of The Climb, with an extra obtainable ending. Made for a class using Bitsy. 

Originally was going to use Borksy hacks to have transparent backgrounds for sprites like before but, for some reason Borksy was cutting out the endings' dialogue. Not sure why right now. Will be something to try and fix for the future.

Developed by Leon Tanlim, Oscar Frayre, Jeanne Favaro, & Andrew Navoy
